sentences.en: Among them: How could the states afford to supply lawyers to all indigent defendants?
sentences.cn: 其中包括：各州如何承担为所有贫穷被告提供律师的费用？

sentences.en: His single - mindedness was forged in indigent childhood.
sentences.cn: 童年的贫苦生活养成了李明博坚定的性格.

sentences.en: No where in the article does it mention her financial status. So…what is it that leads everyone to assume she was indigent?
sentences.cn: 在文章中哪也没提及她的财务状况。那么…究竟是什么导致每个人都认为她是贫困的？

sentences.en: They "either fail to pay anything or pay a greatly-reduced amount designed for indigent or low income patients lacking insurance, " according to DHS.
sentences.cn: 他们“一分钱都不付或者只支付非常少的费用，原先为贫困或短缺保险的低收入病人设定的费用。”

trans.tran_cn: 贫穷的，贫困的，缺少钱财的
